description: The Thrifty Scotsman Drive-In has been providing Spokane with great meals at low prices for over 3 decades, and now they're bringing that same service to the streets! Thrifty Scotsman 2go is ready and waiting to cook up a delicious burger with a side of fresh cut fries just for you. Always made to order and served up with a smile, every meal you have from Thrifty Scotsman 2go is sure to be the highlight of your day!
name: Thrifty Scotsman 2go
